dct_title_s: The states of Ohio, Indiana & Illinois : and Michigan Territory
dct_description_sm: Map shows parts of adjoining states.;Map shows population of counties for the states of Ohio, Indiana, Illinois and the Michigan Territory.;Map contains legend.;Map shows longitude west from Washington.;41 x 51 cm.;ca. 1:2,150,000
